Schedule

Below is our current schedule. We update this page regularly; check back for new events and announcements.

Date Time Title Description Location
Feb 10, 2025 4:00–5:00 PM Welcome & Social Kickoff Meet fellow mathematics graduate students, hear about the group, and help plan the semester's events. Science Center, Room 309
Feb 17, 2025 4:00–5:00 PM Graduate Student Lightning Talks A collection of short talks from participants on topics of interest across pure and applied mathematics. Science Center, Room 309
Feb 24, 2025 4:00–5:00 PM Problem Session & Collaboration Hour An informal session for discussing problems, sharing approaches, and collaborating across research areas. Science Center, Room 309
